title: Learning Guide: Learn How To Wave

steps.name: Preparation
steps.how: Set up your practice area and equipment. Review safety guidelines.
steps.why: Proper preparation ensures safe and effective practice.

steps.name: Basic Technique
steps.how: Learn the fundamental movements slowly and with control.
steps.why: Building proper form is essential before adding speed or power.

steps.name: Practice
steps.how: Repeat the movements with focus on accuracy and consistency.
steps.why: Repetition builds muscle memory and confidence.

steps.name: Application
steps.how: Apply the skill in realistic scenarios or with variations.
steps.why: Real-world application tests understanding and adaptability.
